page.title: 03A HENFIELD SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: We go to school for 8.50 a.m. and at 8.55 a.m. the whistle goes. We lead in to our classes and put our bags and coats in the classroom. After the register we go to assembly. In the Hall our Service is lead by the Headmaster, sometimes by the Deputy Head, sometimes by visiting clergy and sometimes by classes. I like these assemblies best. Afterwards we go back to our classes and then start work. We do Maths, and English mainly in the mornings and sometimes there are television programmes. In the afternoon we have Art and Craft, R.I.,History and Geography. I like writing stories. I do not like copying writing. It is fun using the computer. I like games and Gym and my favourite is Swimming. Playtimes are 10.30 to 10.45 a.m. and 2.30 to 2.45 p.m. Lunch is 12 to 1 p.m. We finish at 3.30 p.m.
